client.gui.customer

Class HomeHeatingFuelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.customer.HomeHeatingFuelController

  • public class HomeHeatingFuelController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for Home heating fuel order. The first screen contain all the process of the home heating fuel order. The second screen contain the order details.
    Version:
    final
    Author:
    OrMamamn

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(javafx.scene.layout.Pane changePane)
        This function gets HomeHeatingFuelForm.fxml and load it to the main pain.
        Parameters:
        changePane - - change the exist pain to HomeHeatingFuelForm.fxml

      • initUI

        public void initUI()
        This function initialize home heating fuel order form

      • showHelp

        public void showHelp(boolean isShow)
        This method is responsible to show help to the user.
        Parameters:
        isShow - - boolaen value.

      • showPurchaseDetails

        public void showPurchaseDetails()
        This function activates the second screen of home heating fuel order and close the first screen. The second screen includes the details of the order: Order id,shipping date,Adders for shipping,Date supply.

      • initCreditCardFields

        public void initCreditCardFields()
        This function initialize the payment method choice box and date validation choice box.

      • initOrderSummary

        public void initOrderSummary()
        This function initialize the Order Summary fields.

      • updatePaymentFormOnPaymentMethodClick

        public void updatePaymentFormOnPaymentMethodClick()
        This function displays the credit card fields if the user choose to pay in credit card option. If the user register with credit card, we set his credit card details to the credit card field.

      • homeHeatingFuelFormTest

        public java.lang.Boolean homeHeatingFuelFormTest()
        This function coordinates all the fields tests.In case the user choose to pay in credit card, the function will check the fields that contain to credit card.
        Returns:
        if one of the tests fails the function will return false,, else the function will return true.

      • checkAmountField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkAmountField(java.lang.Boolean showErrorMsg)
        This function check the amount field.This function performs the following tests: -Field is empty. -Field contain string. -The user insert negative amount.
        Parameters:
        showErrorMsg - for showing error message to the user only after he click on submit button.
        Returns:
        true if all the test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkStreetField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkStreetField()
        This function check if street field is empty.
        Returns:
        true if this test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkCityField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkCityField()
        This function check if city field is empty.
        Returns:
        true if this test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkDateSupplyField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkDateSupplyField()
        This function check the date supply datePicker field. This function performs the following tests: -The user didn't choose date. -The selected date has already passed.
        Returns:
        true if all the test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkPaymentMethodField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkPaymentMethodField()
        This function check if the user didn't select payment method in 'method payment' choice box .
        Returns:
        true if this test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkFuelCompanyField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkFuelCompanyField()
        This function check if the user didn't select company in 'fuel company' choice box .
        Returns:
        true if this test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkCardNumberField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkCardNumberField()
        This function check the card number field. This function performs the following tests: -This field is empty. -This field contain string. -The user entered an invalid credit card length.
        Returns:
        true if all the test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkCVVField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkCVVField()
        This function check the cvv field. This function performs the following tests: -This field is empty. -This field contain string. -The user entered an invalid cvv length.
        Returns:
        true if all the test passed, else the function return false.

      • checkDateValidationField

        public java.lang.Boolean checkDateValidationField()
        This function check the date validation datePicker field. This function performs the following tests: -The user didn't choose date validation. -The selected date has already passed.
        Returns:
        true if all the test passed, else the function return false.

      • getFuelObjectByType

        public float getFuelObjectByType(java.lang.String fuelType)
        This function get fuel object(fuelType, pricePerLitter, maxPricePerLitter) from data base and return the current price per litter.
        Parameters:
        fuelType - will be home heating fuel
        Returns:
        the current price per litter.

      • getOrderIdFromDB

        public void getOrderIdFromDB(com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
        This function get the order id of the user from data base. In home_heating_fuel_orders table we generate order id in data base.
        Parameters:
        json - is the current user order.

      • calcTotalPrice

        public java.lang.String calcTotalPrice(float amountOfLitters)
        This function calculate the price of the order - before and after discount. After calculating, the function updates the Order Summary labels.
        Parameters:
        amountOfLitters - is the amount of fuel that the user wants to buy.
        Returns:
        the total price of the order.
